column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Unavaatu says : " With you out of the way , I will be the one true Avatar . "
#Text=Ikki says : " Mommy , it 's Jinora .
#Text=Let me see .
#Text=Be careful sweetie !
#Text=" Unavaatu says : " No !
#Text=" Korra says : " Raava !
#Text=" Unavaatu says : " No !
#Text=" Korra says : " Go in peace .
#Text=" Raava says : " Harmonic Convergence is nearly over .
#Text=We must return to the Spirit World so we can fuse once again .
#Text=" Jinora says : " I 'll see you soon , Dad .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Gran - Gran , I missed you .
#Text=" Asami says : " What about Korra and the others ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " Do n't worry , they 're all right .
#Text=Korra saved the world .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " The Avatar Spirit has returned .
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's over .
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't even know what to say .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You were amazing .
#Text=" Bolin says : " And the way you turned all gigantic like that , wow !
#Text=I just wished Varrick was here to film it !
#Text=It would be the greatest mover ever .
#Text=After the Nuktuk chronicles of course .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm sorry about your father .
#Text=But he was already fused with Vaatu .
#Text=I could n't save him .
#Text=" Eska says : " It seems cousin Korra is under the impression we 're saddened by our father 's demise .
#Text=" Desna says : " But I will not miss him at all .
#Text=In the end , he became a deplorable man .
#Text=" Eska says : " Agreed .
#Text=But how will we explain this to mother ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " So , I was thinking .
#Text=I 'm not really a fan of a long - distance relationship thing , so how about you move to Republic City with me .
#Text=" Eska says : " I do not think it will be possible .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Okay .
#Text=Desna can come too .
#Text=" Eska says : " I will not be joining you , Bolin .
#Text=Desna and I must return home .
#Text=" Bolin says : " But you said - " Eska says : " Eternal darkness was upon us .
#Text=I became caught up in the moment .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah .
#Text=I guess I did too .
#Text=" Eska says : " But , you will always hold the special place in the organ that pumps my blood .
#Text=I will remember you fondly .
#Text=My turtle duck .
#Text="
